headline: How Recent Developments Are Rewriting the Story for 3M Amid Progress and PFAS Risk
summary: 3M's fair value estimate has inched down to $174.25 while the discount rate and revenue growth assumptions remain almost unchanged, signaling only a subtle recalibration rather than a wholesale rethink of the stock's prospects. This slight adjustment reflects a market narrative that is becoming cautiously more constructive on execution and innovation, yet still weighed down by unresolved PFAS liabilities and uneven end market demand. Read on to see how this evolving balance of optimism and...
